title: Hiren's Magical Adventure
description: When Hiren hits his teen years, just like any other American Indian teenager, he starts to question some of the rules & traditions his parents enforce. His parents want him to learn about his culture and so they decide to send him back to India for the summer. He reluctantly says good bye to his friends and family and goes on the journey of a lifetime. He learns about fascinating traditions that date back thousands of years. He meets a mysterious girl that shows him some of the magic in India. She introduces him to the exotic animals friends in the jungle and teaches him about the magical meditation that enables them to leave their bodies and let their spirits travel through the universe. He also encounters some ghostly family secrets wrapped in mysticism and mystery. He finds that India is a whole different world and yet deep down inside, people are people wherever you go...And in the end, he learns that love truly conquers all.
author: Kathleen Patel
